sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The novels of Dom Francisco de Quevedo Villegas, knight of the order of St. James Faithfully Englished. Whereunto is added, The marriage of Belphegor, an Italian novel. Translated from Machiavel. Quevedo, Francisco de, 1580-1645. aut Salas Barbadillo, Alonso Jerónimo, 1581-1635. Machiavelli, Niccolò, 1469-1527. Novella di Belfagor. English. aut
[8], 159, [1] p.
printed for John Starkey, at the Miter in Fleet-street, near Temple-bar, London : 1671.
With two preliminary advertisement leaves. Caption title on p. 1 reads: The novels of Dom Francisco de Quevedo, the night-adventurer. Part 1 running title reads: The night-adventurer. "The marriage of Belphegor" has caption title on p. 135; register and pagination are continuous. Formerly Wing (2nd ed.) Q192. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8], 159, [1] p.
printed for John Starkey, at the Miter in Fleet-street, near Temple-bar, London : 1671.
With two preliminary advertisement leaves. Caption title on p. 1 reads: The novels of Dom Francisco de Quevedo, the night-adventurer. Part 1 running title reads: The night-adventurer. "The marriage of Belphegor" has caption title on p. 135; register and pagination are continuous. Formerly Wing (2nd ed.) Q192. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
